What is (are) Hereditary diffuse leukoencephalopathy with spheroids ?,"Hereditary diffuse leukoencephalopathy with spheroids (HDLS) is a neurological condition characterized by changes to certain areas of the brain. A hallmark of HDLS is leukoencephalopathy,
